name: Mousia
tips: Increase speed by using your abilities or gear to deal more ability damage.

ski.name: WANNA BE RICH?
desc: Mousia hurls treasure at a target, dealing physical damage and causing Greed. Abilities that hit during this time also have their cooldowns reset. Greed: Enemy is dazzled by money, reducing Armor and Magic Resist.

ski.name: INHERATANCE
desc: Floods a target direction with treasure, dealing magic damage to enemies affected and greatly reducing Movement Speed to enemies struck 3 times.
study: Throw treasures in the specified direction to deal damage

ski.name: CASHBOX
desc: Mousia leaps up, pouring treasure out of her pouch, dealing magic damage to an area and granting invulnerability while leaping. Passive - Pearl Shield: Treasure regularly falls out of the pouch to create a shield that blocks damage. When broken, the shield explodes and the dispersed treasure Stuns nearby enemies for 1 second, dealing low damage. Passive - Nimble: Bonus Attack Speed increases Mousia's ability damage.
study: Pours treasurs to deals damage in a zone

ski.name: BESPANGLED
desc: Takes out a dazzling jewel to deal physical damage and continuously blind enemies within range, making Mousia invisible in the area. A target can be blinded for up to 1 sec. Passive: Both Attack Speed and Movement Speed increase when any of her abilities deals damage.
study: Summons pearls to deals Damage and Blind

story: As a patron saint of the poor, Mousia tried taking issue with the gods about the thievery, but the gods weren't worried about such a trivial little demi-god like Mousia. Refusing to give up, Mousia took matters into her own hands. This little critter is always taking risks standing up for the little guy out there.
